senses.de: A tool or device used for a specific task, mainly to make or mend things.
senses.ex: He uses a variety of instruments to fix the car.

Tips.title: Practical Use
Tips.description: Focus on the physical tasks 'instrument' can perform, like cutting or measuring.
Tips.example: He picked up the instrument to tighten the screws.

Tips.title: Tangible Objects
Tips.description: 'Instrument' refers to items you can actually touch, not abstract tools.
Tips.example: The dentist's instruments were sterilized before use.

Tips.title: Specificity
Tips.description: 'Instrument' often indicates a specialized object designed for particular tasks.
Tips.example: A carpenter uses specific instruments to carve wood.

senses.de: A device used for producing music.
senses.ex: She plays three instruments: piano, violin, and guitar.

Tips.title: Artistic Expression
Tips.description: When referring to music, 'instrument' often implies creative or artistic use.
Tips.example: Her favorite instrument to express emotions is the cello.

Tips.title: Skill Development
Tips.description: Learning to play an instrument usually requires practice and training.
Tips.example: He's taking lessons to master the instrument.

senses.de: A means by which something is achieved, done, or acted upon.
senses.ex: Education can be an instrument of social change.

Tips.title: Abstract Usage
Tips.description: In abstract contexts, 'instrument' means a way to accomplish something.
Tips.example: The new policy is an instrument for economic reform.

Tips.title: Figurative Speech
Tips.description: Can be used metaphorically to suggest someone or something is a means to an end.
Tips.example: He was merely an instrument in their scheme.

senses.de: A formal written legal document, such as a contract or will.
senses.ex: The loan agreement was a legally binding instrument.

Tips.title: Legally Binding
Tips.description: Refers to documents that have formal or legal power.
Tips.example: Sign this instrument to finalize the sale.

Tips.title: Contractual Context
Tips.description: Used in contexts where binding agreements are made.
Tips.example: The instrument outlined the terms of the lease.

senses.de: A tool or implement used in science, like a microscope or telescope.
senses.ex: This lab is equipped with all the necessary scientific instruments.

Tips.title: Research and Study
Tips.description: Science-related 'instruments' are often used for experiments or observations.
Tips.example: The astronomer used a new instrument to observe the stars.

Tips.title: Precision Required
Tips.description: Scientific instruments typically require exact measurement and careful handling.
Tips.example: The lab technician calibrated the instrument carefully.

Apparatus.wordDefinition:
Apparatus refers to a group of tools or equipment used for a specific scientific or technical purpose. For example, a chemistry laboratory may contain various apparatus like beakers, test tubes, pipettes, etc.

Apparatus refers to a collection of different instruments used together for a specific purpose.

Contraption.wordDefinition:
Contraption refers to a device or machine that is made up of various parts or components, usually in a complex or unusual way.

Contraption describes something that is more complex or unusual in its design, while instrument describes something that is more functional or purposeful in its design.

Device.wordDefinition:
A device is an object or machine that is created to perform a specific function. It usually refers to something that is electronic or mechanical.

Examples of devices include smartphones, laptops, and printers.

A device is used to perform a task or function, while an instrument is used to measure or observe something.

Equipment.wordDefinition:
Equipment generally refers to items that are used for a specific purpose or activity, while instrument refers to tools or devices that are used to perform a specific task.

For example, a kitchen might have various pieces of equipment like a stove, an oven, a refrigerator, and a blender, while a musician might use instruments like a guitar, a piano, or a drum set.

Equipment is a broader term that refers to any collection of tools and items that are needed for a specific task or activity, while instruments specifically refer to tools that are used to perform a task related to music, science, medicine, or some other specialized field.

Gadget.wordDefinition:
A gadget is a small tool or device that is designed for a specific purpose, often with a novel or innovative design, and sometimes seen as a novelty or toy.

Examples of gadgets include smartphones, fitness trackers, and portable gaming consoles.

Overall, while gadgets are generally used for entertainment or everyday activities, instruments tend to be more specialized tools used for particular purposes in science, music, and other areas.

Implement.wordDefinition:
Implement refers to something that is used to put a plan or idea into action. For example, a company might implement a new policy to improve workplace safety.

Implement is applicable when we want to talk about putting something into practice.

The difference between the two is that implement refers to the action of doing something, while instrument refers to the tool or device used to do it.

Machine.wordDefinition:
A machine is a device that performs a task using mechanical or electronic energy.

It can be used to make something, transport or move objects, or perform complex calculations, among other things. Machines are usually automated and do not require human intervention to perform their intended task.

An instrument is a tool designed to aid a person in performing a specific task, while a machine is a device that performs a task on its own.

Tool.wordDefinition:
It can be something that is used in music, surgery, or science, for example. An instrument is typically more specialized than a tool and may require specific training or skill to use.

Tool, on the other hand, refers to any device or object that is used to make a task easier or more efficient.

A tool can be something as simple as a hammer or as complex as a software program. Tools are generally more versatile than instruments and can be used in a variety of situations.

An instrument is a specialized device used for a particular task or purpose, while a tool is a more general device used to make tasks easier or more efficient.

Utensil.wordDefinition:
An instrument is typically more technical and specialized than an utensil.

Utensil usually refers to a tool or device used for preparing or serving food or for general domestic purposes.

For example, a fork is an eating utensil, a ladle is a cooking utensil, and a broom is a cleaning utensil. Utensils are typically more everyday, practical objects than instruments.

In summary, instruments are tools that are typically more technical or specialized, while utensils are tools that are typically more everyday or domestic.

videos.Text: Playing a musical instrument engages practically every area of the brain at once, especially the visual, auditory, and motor cortices. As with any other workout, disciplined, structured practice in playing music strengthens those brain functions, allowing us to apply that strength to other activities.

Because lefties are worse at using these tools, and suffer from higher accident rates, they would be less successful in a purely cooperative world, eventually disappearing from the population.

These are called ground truth measurements.

videos.Text: String instruments are plucked or bowed. Woodwinds have air blown against a reed or sharp edge. For brass instruments, however, the vibration come directly from the musician's mouth. One of the first things a brass player must learn is to breathe in deeply,

videos.Text: Mastering any physical skill, be it performing a pirouette, playing an instrument, or throwing a baseball, takes practice. Practice is the repetition of an action with the goal of improvement, and it helps us perform with more ease, speed, and confidence.
videos.Title: How to practice...

videos.Text: Some need a stand or a stool. But the cajon is a drum, a stand and a seat all in one convenient box. And this simplicity may be key to its journey across continents and cultures to become one of the most popular percussion instruments in the world today.
videos.Title: Rhythm in a box: The...

videos.Text: This is the instrument that makes us to communicate with the animal. The moment when the animal hears this sound means that it has to stop what it is doing and then come for food. They then have to learn that sniffing in a hole
videos.Title: These Rats Can Detect...

quotes.Text: Did you know that the human voice is the only pure instrument? That it has notes no other instrument has? It's like being between the keys of a piano. The notes are there, you can sing them, but they can't be found on any instrument. That's like me. I live in between this. I live in both worlds, the black and white world.
quotes.Title: American Musician
quotes.Name: Nina Simone

quotes.Text: I am concerned about the whole man. I am concerned about what the people, using their government as an instrument and a tool, can do toward building the whole man, which will mean a better society and a better world.
quotes.Title: American President
quotes.Name: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.Text: Poetry is - it's an art form, but, to me, it's also a weapon, it's also an instrument. It's the ability to make ideas that have been known, felt and said. And that's a real, I think, type of duty for the poet.
quotes.Title: American Poet
quotes.Name: Amanda Gorman

quotes.Text: Conservatives really don't believe in politics as the primary instrument of getting along in life and therefore don't tend to put their energy into it a way people left of center do.
quotes.Title: American Comedian
quotes.Name: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.Text: I've always said that I use my voice as an instrument. It was something I created myself, and I said, 'Have voice, will travel.
quotes.Title: American Artist
quotes.Name: Yoko Ono

quotes.Text: Anything that encourages people to pick up an instrument and play, I'm fully behind.
quotes.Title: American Singer
quotes.Name: Taylor Swift

quotes.Text: Lord, make me an instrument of thy peace. Where there is hatred, let me sow love.
quotes.Title: Italian Saint
quotes.Name: Francis of Assisi

quotes.Text: There's a humble beauty about listening to period instruments that I like.
quotes.Title: South Korean Director
quotes.Name: Park Chan-wook

quotes.Text: Something that has so much power must have life. Instruments have life.
quotes.Title: American Musician
quotes.Name: Laurie Anderson

quotes.Text: Riches are not an end of life, but an instrument of life.
quotes.Title: American Clergyman
quotes.Name: Henry Ward Beecher
